basic.description: This course stresses the application of behavioral principles within business, industry, mental health, and Applied Behavior Analysis service-delivery settings. The class provides an overview of contemporary research and practice in the field of Performance Management as well as topics related to research-based strategies for supervising employees in a variety of settings.
basic.subject: EAB
basic.title: Behavior Analysis in Performance Management and Supervision

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites: EAB 3703 and EXP 3422 or equivalents or instructor permission.
